Articles.Content:
i used mechjeb 1.98 and with him i landel easy on moon,but with mechjeb 2 i cant land on it!

Must i use rendezvous maneuver ?

thx
Right, that's the one. Should be rather easy to find anyway.

Why won't it land?

I know MJ is using a new way of landing, mine is suicide burn. I was really close to hitting the ground and I was 100% sure I will crash...but nope....last few inches, full burn and a nice stop lol
